resources.string: Warning ! Game saves are linked to player ! Remember your previous name if you want to have your save back.

How to play : 

Do not forget to set your name in setting, it will be linked to save !

From the lobby, select a scenario, and have fun ^^.

 You can import scenarios with the + 

At each step, scan the code with the scanner button (bottom-right). If something happens, you have the right code ! Read, play and finally move on ! 

If you have problems with Qr, write them manually from the Code menu
Free to Use for no commercial purpose
Same scenario from same creator already exists. Delete the old one !
